DOC.brief_summary: Matrix metalloproteinases ( MMPs ) ; activate application adhesive system dentin cause degradation collagen proteins loss bond strength adhesive restoration . Caffeic acid phenethyl ester ( CAPE ) show inhibitory activity dentinal MMPs . It hypothesise dentin pretreatment CAPE , MMP inhibitor , would beneficial bond resin material tooth substrate course time . This study evaluate effect 5 % CAPE pretreatment microtensile bond strength nanohybrid resin restoration apply total-etch self-etch adhesive system 10 patient ( 12-18 yr ) . Two standard cavity ( 3 x 3 x 4 mm ) prepare occlusal surface one two premolar teeth patient randomly assign four treatment group ( n=10 ) ; 5 % CAPE pretreatment total-etch adhesive ( TC ) , Total-etch adhesive ( control ) ( T ) , 5 % CAPE pretreatment self-etch adhesive ( SC ) , Self-etch adhesive ( control ) ( S ) follow restoration 3 month intra-oral functioning . After teeth extraction , specimens store distilled water+thymol solution 4°C inhibit microbial growth use one week period . Dentin-composite stick obtain restoration µTBS test scan electron microscopy ( SEM ) evaluation . Failure mode analysis perform microscopically . Data analyse statistically use Repeated Measure ANOVA ( p < 0.05 ) . Dentin pretreatment CAPE solution ( 5 % ) 60 second significantly increase composite resin restoration ' bond strength dentin applied either total-etch self-etch adhesive system . Thus use MMP inhibitor prior resin restoration . However long term clinical study need support use CAPE pretreatment along self-etch total-etch adhesive system .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Caffeic Acid Phenethyl Ester Matrix Metalloproteinase Inhibitor : Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The aim present study evaluate effect caffeic acid phenethyl ester ( CAPE ) pretreatment use matrix metalloproteinase ( MMP ) inhibitor microtensile bond strength ( µTBS ) nanohybrid resin restoration apply total-etch self-etch adhesive system . A total 10 patient age 12 18 year old ( 4 male , 6 female , mean age:15 ) receive 40 composite restoration . The patient contralateral pair caries-free premolar plan extracted orthodontic treatment enrol study . This study perform protocol approve Ethical Committee Clinical Studies , Faculty Medicine , University Ege , Izmir , Turkey ( 04.10.2012 ; no:12-8/6 ) . The treatment perform informed consent receive parent patient . Included teeth function anomaly find neither teeth occlusion . Two standard cavity ( 3 x 3 x 4 mm ) continuous enamel cavosurface margin prepare occlusal surface premolar tooth.Totally four cavity patient randomly assign four treatment group ( n=10 ) ; Group TC : CAPE total-etch adhesive ( Syntac ; Ivoclar Vivadent AG ) , Group T : Total-etch adhesive ( control ) , Group SC : CAPE self-etch adhesive ( AdheSE ; Ivoclar Vivadent AG ) , Group S : Self-etch adhesive ( control ) . All cavity restore incrementally nano-filled hybrid composite resin ( Tetric-N-Ceram , Ivoclar Vivadent AG ) polymerization layer perform 40 second light-curing unit ( BluePhase Ivoclar Vivadent AG ) exceed energy output 500mw/sec .
DOC.criteria: I Occlusally function teeth without anomaly Good oral hygiene No systemical disorder No periodontal diseases No allergic reaction dental material Patients eligible premolar teeth extraction orthodontic treatment Poor oral hygiene Nonfunctioning premolar teeth include Patients systemical disorder , periodontal diseases allergic reaction dental material
